commit_message: Change paper link to GB's in readme
Update preprint link to version 4 in README.md

Update README.md

Update the preprint link to version 3.

Minor change in Illumina figure (Fig. S9)

Change in script create_all_illumin_plots_of_the_paper.Rmd to create
Illunima plots. Pipeline names were changed.

Change diretory structure

This is to accommodate new analyses from Nanopore and Illumina.

Update create_all_plots_of_the_paper.Rmd

Compara pipelines per read coverage ranges, besides other changes.

Update ASE analysis

We were using duplicated short-read data to find ASE sites.

Update script wtc11_iso_seq.sh

file XGSUV_20200804_S64049_PL100158447-1_A01.ccs.bam was uploaded to
NCBI SRA, and NEB_primers.fasta uploaded to zenodo.org/record/6332914.

Fix mistake in homopolymer analysis

Fix mistake in identify_indels_within_and_outside_homopolimer_repeats.R
script. This changed the results in Fig. 2C, Clair3-mix, deletion
calls, to be like it used to be before running all scripts at the
second time, which is a more consistent result. The conclusion in the
paper for this new result is: 'Unsurprisingly, the performance of all
pipelines dropped as the length of homopolymer increased'.

Update script, lrRNAseqBenchmark has changed

The splice_junction_analysis_table function no longer uses rds file paths
as input. Now it uses the master table data.frame itself.

Another change in the function is the new parameter `method_dataset_name`.
Add script to download WTC-11 Iso-Seq data

Codes into isoseq_variant_calling_analysis_code

Organize files into the directories isoseq_variant_calling_analysis_code,
tools, and images.

Merge branch 'download_data' into main

Create directory 1_download_data, move all code used to download data
to this directory, and add missing codes.
Add download_data dir and some files
Change file names of ENCSR673UKZ short rna-seq
Change Jurkat sorted aln.bam name to aln_s.bam
Add code to delete temp files into scripts

Update README.md

Use function removeRepeatedLowerQualSites.r, add missing links, and other minor changes.

Change script to use removeRepeatedLowerQualSites

Both Clair3 variant-calling scripts changed to use
removeRepeatedLowerQualSites.r, and the output file name of the
function was changed to pileup_pass_mix_norep.recode.vcf.gz.

Add removeRepeatedLowerQualSites.r function

Also, give execute permission to removeRepeatedLowerQualSites.r and
flagCorrection.r.

Merge pull request #1 from markrobinsonuzh/main

Mark's corrections in README.md
Make flagCorrection.r use fewer input parameters

Minor change in Jurkat/WTC11 Iso-Seq date address

Change folder name to iso_seq.
Minor changes scripts for master table creation

Make changes in homopolymer-pre-analysis script

Now, identify_indels_within_and_outside_homopolimer_repeats.R filters
the unfiltered master table by itself, without saving it to a file.

Make changes in mt_wtc11_allMethods_v7.Rmd

Now, the script does not generate the filtered master table
mt_wtc11_allMethods_filtered_v7_filterVariantDensityIsoSeqAllMethods
(RData file) anymore. That is because it is specific for the
homopolymer analysis.
Minor corrections in jurkat/wtc11 mt v7

Create mt_wtc11_allMethods_v7.Rmd

Also, delete mt_wtc11_allMethods_v6.Rmd and the RData files generated
by it. With v7, master tables (in RData files) are not stored in this
repo.

Create mt_jurkat_allMethods_v7.Rmd

Delete mt_jurkat_allMethods_v6.Rmd and the RData files generated by it.
With v7, master tables (in RData files) are not stored in this repo.
Filter out non-PASS variants in Jurkat truth
Change flagCorrection to be a R script
Add first (all bash) version of flagCorrection.sh

Make changes in create_all_plots_of_the_paper.Rmd

In Fig. 2, change 'Precision measures' changed to 'Performance
measures'. In the supplementary figures, 'Method' changed to
'Pipelines'.

Make changes in create_all_plots_of_the_paper.Rmd

Change address of input master tables.

Add numbers to Fig. 1B

Fig. 1B is the inverse piramid that shows the number of variants in
the ground truth after each filtering step.

Update splice_junction_proximity.R

Change the input master table to version 6.

Modify create_all_plots_of_the_pap

Update the input file addresses of the master tables. Make changes
in the UpSet plots. Give more space between figures of Fig. 1 and
Fig. 2. In comments, change the address of support scripts.
Copy the scripts from the iso-seq benchmar repo
